Class VirtualGambleControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockmarket.controller.VirtualGambleControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VirtualGambleController

    public class VirtualGambleControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements VirtualGambleController
    This is a Controller Class which implements the VirtualGambleController Interface. It implements all the operations mandated by the VirtualGambleController Interface.
